data.title: EverybodyWiki Bios & Wiki
data.text:
Mohit Malhotra is the CEO of Dabur International a Subsidiary of Dabur India. Presently, Group Chief Executive Officer and Executive Director on the board of Dabur International Ltd with span exceeding 100 markets globally.[1] He joined Dabur in 1994 and handled key assignments in marketing and sales. Subsequently, as the business head of Europe, he was instrumental in opening up the US markets. In 2004, he moved into Daburâ€™s international business division as head of marketing based in Dubai and took over the reins as CEO in 2008.[2]

Awards and accolades[edit]

Mohit Malhotra was honoured with the 'International Achievement Award' at the Annual Indian CEO Awards 2014 organized by CEO Middle East.[3]

Honoured with the Times Now and ICICI Bank NRI of the year award in the professional category [4][5]
